titles.title: A resolution to state the sense of the Senate concerning the Government of Japan recognizing American college and university branch campuses in Japan as American Institutions of higher learning.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14881-14882)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Government of Japan should: (1) immediately cease its discriminatory policy toward branch campuses approved by the Association of American Colleges and Universities in Japan; (2) accord official status to such campuses as American institutions of higher education and grant them all the rights and privileges enjoyed by similar Japanese educational institutions; and (3) grant student visas to students wishing to attend such campuses in Japan and accord them all such rights and privileges.
